<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      1 - thumb instructions</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Select the appropriate difference relocation type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho/#ad23021ed657c8b0f302154585b0fd3bfa7ddb841f45e7015c8cbb2694c78205d8">MachO::ARM&#95;RELOC&#95;HALF&#95;SECTDIFF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Value2 = Writer-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machobjectwriter/#a9c098d5087a761f4ff5d1862ae8dfcbe">getSymbolAddress</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getSymbol(), Asm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FixedValue -= Writer-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machobjectwriter/#a3d1db2b8157f2659ddbb53b5515bf1f7">getSectionAddress</a>(SB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol/#afe11aa50f8890a5eeda1fadf7e2f576e">getFragment</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment/#a7b98ffc5ede97acf84a20b7476d3ffff">getParent</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Relocations are written out in reverse order, so the PAIR comes first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ARM&#95;RELOC&#95;HALF and ARM&#95;RELOC&#95;HALF&#95;SECTDIFF abuse the r&#95;length field:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For these two r&#95;type relocations they always have a pair following them and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the r&#95;length bits are used differently.  The encoding of the r&#95;length is as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   low bit of r&#95;length:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      0 - :lower16: for movw instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      1 - :upper16: for movt instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   high bit of r&#95;length:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      0 - arm instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      1 - thumb instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the other half of the relocated expression is in the following pair</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relocation entry in the low 16 bits of r&#95;address field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ThumbBit = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MovtBit = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppctlsdynamiccall-cpp/#a4a235aedca5bbfc39934045b6cbf9c70">Fixup</a>.getTargetKind()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">: </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ad950a20a6062ddd7f336a9eede28bdf0a551a7051fef9738a64327579574a84f1">ARM::fixup&#95;arm&#95;movt&#95;hi16</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MovtBit = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The thumb bit shouldn&#39;t be set in the &#39;other-half&#39; bit of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relocation, but it will be set in FixedValue if the base symbol</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is a thumb function. Clear it out here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexstyle/#a2ff7bb0072f1202f7b06bb426d6ecda0aee14e37b71e28e68ace5e2f6b67042a9">Asm</a>.isThumbFunc(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a difference or a defined symbol plus an offset, then we need a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even when it&#39;s not a scattered relocation, movw/movt always uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a PAIR relocation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho/#ad23021ed657c8b0f302154585b0fd3bfaf6e91ff8795152a02d4310c2debff044">MachO::ARM&#95;RELOC&#95;HALF</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The entire addend is needed to correctly apply a relocation. One half is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extracted from the instruction itself, the other comes from this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PAIR. I.e. it&#39;s correct that we insert the high bits of the addend in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MOVW case here.  relocation entries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppctlsdynamiccall-cpp/#a4a235aedca5bbfc39934045b6cbf9c70">Fixup</a>.getTargetKind()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
